feat: Implement storm-themed animation system with interactive components

Major implementation of Phase 1-4 of the storm-themed animation strategy.
Added 13 core features with full responsive support and accessibility.

## New Features

### Infrastructure (Phase 1)
- Custom hooks: useMousePosition, useScrollVelocity, useReducedMotion, useMediaQuery, useStormWeather
- StormWeatherContext for global storm state management
- Storm configurations for 5 themes: hail, snow, fire, rain, thunder
- Animation variants, transitions, and utilities library

### Text & Button Animations (Phase 2)
- AnimatedText component with 3 variants (letter-reveal, storm-shuffle, gradient-shift)
- MagneticButton with cursor-following attraction
- Applied to hero headlines and CTAs

### Storm Particle Systems (Phase 3)
- Canvas-based StormParticles with RAF animation loop
- 5 unique particle systems with distinct behaviors and visuals
- MixedStormParticles for simultaneous multi-storm rendering
- Mouse interactivity (repel, attract, avoid, split behaviors)
- Integrated with hero background and teams section

### Interactive Cards & Scroll (Phase 4)
- FlipCard component with 3D rotation (flip on hover/tap)
- TiltCard component with mouse-tracking tilt and storm shine effects
- ScrollProgress indicator with top bar, side dots, and lightning effects
- Storm switching: Teams section tabs now change background particles

## Technical Details

### Components Created
- src/components/animations/AnimatedText.tsx
- src/components/animations/StormParticles.tsx
- src/components/animations/FlipCard.tsx

- 5 custom hooks in src/hooks/

### Landing Page Updates
- Refactored to LandingContent component with StormWeatherProvider
- Added storm mapping to teams (Fire, Rain, Hail, Thunder)
- Integrated ScrollProgress with 6 tracked sections
- Dynamic storm switching via useEffect on team selection
- Teams array wrapped in useMemo for performance

### Performance
- Bundle size: 169 kB (+11 kB from baseline, well within +50 kB target)
- RAF-based animations at 60fps
- Responsive particle counts (desktop/mobile)
- Throttled mouse tracking
- prefers-reduced-motion support throughout

### Accessibility
- Keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
- ARIA labels and roles
- Motion preferences respected
- Focus states and indicators

- Updated IMPLEMENTATION_PROGRESS.md with detailed progress tracking
- 13/15 core features complete (87%)
- Phase 1-4 fully implemented
